titleStmt.title: The defence of the Parliament of England in the case of James the II, or, A treatise of regal power and of the right of the people drawn from ancient councils ... and more especially the ordinances of the doctors of the Church of Rome ... : wherein is demonstrated that the Holy Scriptures are so far from being contrary, that they do even assent thereto / written in Latin by P. Georgeson, Kt. ; translated by S. Rand.
titleStmt.author: Georgeson, P., Sir.
Rand, S.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
